title: Exploring Ethics in Recommender Systems: Practitioner Workshop Using Q-Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data security and algorithm comprehension
context.additional_context: A process for language education practitioners to explore ethical issues in recommendation systems and analyze diverse perspectives through Q-methodology.

learning_goals: Explain data collection and utilization principles in recommendation systems within an ethical framework
Classify differences in ethical perspectives among peer practitioners into three types using Q-methodology
Identify bias cases in recommendation algorithms through VR simulations and propose mitigation strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
